title: Where should I go if this is not my home?
content:
[[=]]
[[module rate]]
[[/=]]
[[include component:ratio-bar base=-- |ex=--]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:author-label-source start=--
|name=Mr. Iverson
|center=*]]
[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/opera-omnia-iverson|Authors page!]]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:author-label-source end=--]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:acs-animation]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:fade-in speed=1]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:jakstyle]]

[[=]]
Where should I go if this is not my home,
Beginning ‘twas easy, a seamless flow,
Cause the gold times are over, do I go?

Perhaps I shouldn’t wander into the night,
But it’s so tempting when the good times slow,
Where should I go if this is not my home?

Remember times when writing wasn’t a fight,
Realize now that trying brings you low,
Cause the gold times are over, do I go?

Hard to go when it’s a cowardly flight,
But as it comes to this I must say no,
Where should I go if this is not my home?

When the touching of paper gives me fright,
And when ideation I can’t even trow,
Cause the gold times are over, do I go?

This is it, I’m done, sad indeed, but right,
Yet I am lost and an answer won’t show,
Where should I go if this is not my home,
Cause the gold times are over, do I go? 
[[/=]]

author: MrIverson
